name: ComfortLifeAsia
0:
”Alexa, turn on my Kitchen lights”
”Alexa, activate Leave my Home”
”Alexa, turn off my lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: By linking your Comfort Life account, you will be able to manage your Comfort Life devices and scenarios with your Amazon Alexa. For example, you can ask your Amazon device to "turn on my Kitchen lights" or "activate Leave my Home"
